00026 #ifndef BDSHELIXSTEPPER_HH
00027 #define BDSHELIXSTEPPER_HH
00028 #include "globals.hh"
00029 #include "G4MagIntegratorStepper.hh"

00034 
00035 class BDSHelixStepper : public G4MagIntegratorStepper
00036 {
00037 
00038   public:  // with description
00039 
00040   BDSHelixStepper(G4Mag_EqRhs *EqRhs);
00041 
00042   ~BDSHelixStepper();
00043 
00044   void Stepper( const G4double y[],
00045                 const G4double dydx[],
00046                 const G4double h,
00047                 G4double yout[],
00048                 G4double yerr[]  );
00049   // The stepper for the Runge Kutta integration.
00050   // The stepsize is fixed, equal to h.
00051   // Integrates ODE starting values y[0 to 6]
00052   // Outputs yout[] and its estimated error yerr[].
00053   
00054   G4double DistChord()   const;
00055   // Estimate maximum distance of curved solution and chord ... 
00056   
00057   void SetBField(G4double aBfield);
00058   G4double GetBField();
00059 
00060   void StepperName();
00061   
00062   /*
00063     void DumbStepper( const G4double yInput[],
00064     G4ThreeVector Bfld,
00065     G4double hstep,
00066     G4double yOut[]);
00067     
00068   */
00069 public: // without description
00070   
00071   G4int IntegratorOrder()const { return 2; }
00072   
00073 protected:
00074   //  --- Methods used to implement all the derived classes -----
00075   
00076   void AdvanceHelix( const G4double  yIn[],
00077                      G4double  h,
00078                      G4double  yHelix[]);    // output 
00079   // A first order Step along a helix inside the field.
00080   
00081 private:
00082   
00083   G4ThreeVector yInitial, yMidPoint, yFinal;
00084   // Data stored in order to find the chord.
00085   
00086   G4Mag_EqRhs*  its_EqRhs;
00087   
00088   G4double itsBField;
00089   G4ThreeVector itsInitialPoint, itsFinalPoint, itsMidPoint,itsDistVec;
00090   G4double itsDist;
00091   
00092 };
00093 
00094 inline  void BDSHelixStepper::SetBField(G4double aBField)
00095 {itsBField=aBField;
00096 }
00097 inline G4double BDSHelixStepper::GetBField()
00098 {return itsBField;}
00099 
00100 inline void BDSHelixStepper::StepperName()
00101 {G4cout<<"BDSHelixStepper"<<G4endl;}
